About.title: UNIVERSITY CLINICS
About.subtitle: UNICHRISTUS
About.description: Excellence in education, care, and commitment to the community's health.
About.about: A fundamental partner since 2016, the University Clinical Analysis Laboratory (LEAC) works in close collaboration with the University Health Clinic and the School of Dentistry Teaching Clinic. Operating from a modern facility under the highest quality standards, LEAC delivers diagnostic services that are essential for patient care and for preparing a new generation of skilled professionals.

ExamResults.title: TEST
ExamResults.subtitle: RESULTS
ExamResults.description: Unichristus University Clinics offers a variety of laboratory and imaging exams for you and your family. We have a team of highly qualified professionals ready to serve you.

clinics.physiotherapyEcological: Physiotherapy Teaching Clinic - Parque Ecológico Campus

Clinics.title: EXCELLENCE IN
Clinics.subtitle: NEAR
Clinics.description: Modern, well equipped clinics with professionals dedicated to comprehensive care for you and your family.

dentistry.title: School of Dentistry Teaching Clinic
description: A modern dental complex where undergraduate and postgraduate students apply current techniques under the guidance of experienced faculty. Our mission is to provide comprehensive care, promote well being, and transform smiles
There are 117 dental stations, where over 2800 free and affordable appointments are performed monthly across the most diverse specialties.
address: Our main unit is located at: Rua Vereador Paulo Mamede Street, 130 - Cocó, Fortaleza - CE, 60192-350
services: Care for patients with special needs

health.title: University Health Clinic
description: Students of Nursing, Medicine, Nutrition, and Psychology provide care to the community under close supervision by specialist professors recognized for academic and professional excellence. We deliver humane, welcoming, and comprehensive care focused on each patient’s well being.
The University Health Clinic offers consultations in 13 medical specialties, providing the community with health services characterized by quality, ethics, and social commitment.
Two programs of great community relevance stand out among its actions:

• Specialized Care Service (SAE) in STI/AIDS, developed in partnership with the Unified Health System (SUS), offering comprehensive and free follow-up to people living with sexually transmitted infections.
• Gynecological Cancer Prevention Program, aimed at early detection, screening, and monitoring of women at higher risk for lower genital tract neoplasms.
address: Our central unit is located at: Rua Vicente Linhares Street, 308 - Aldeota, Fortaleza - CE, 60135-270
services: Chronic conditions: diabetes, hypertension, tuberculosis, and leprosy

physiotherapy.title: Physiotherapy Teaching Clinic
description: A space for health care and academic excellence, dedicated to health promotion and functional rehabilitation. With modern infrastructure, up to date equipment, and humanized care, we offer free physiotherapy services under the direct supervision of experienced faculty.
Our commitment is twofold: to contribute to the practical training of our students and to offer the population ethical, accessible, and evidence-based physiotherapy care.
address: The two units of the Physiotherapy Teaching Clinic are located at:
Parque Ecológico Campus (Rua Vereador Paulo Mamede Street, 130 - Papicu - ZIP Code: 60190-050)
Parquelândia Campus (Rua Uruguai, 11 - Bela Vista - ZIP Code: 60442-590)

imaging.title: University Imaging and Diagnostic Center
description: A teaching and care environment that brings together clinical excellence and quality diagnostic imaging.
Students learn in real time alongside specialized professionals, always with patient care as the priority.
We offer state of the art equipment for MRI, ultrasound, and X-ray, ensuring high quality images and reliable diagnoses.
CESIU is centrally located for easy access, with a modern environment designed to provide the best experience.
address: Our main unit is located at: Rua Vicente Linhares, 308 - Aldeota, Fortaleza - CE, 60135-270

psychology.title: Applied Psychology Training Clinic
description: A teaching and practice space where Psychology students develop skills in listening, welcoming, clinical practice, and teamwork, always under the supervision of senior faculty across areas of practice.

Committed to social responsibility, the Applied Psychology Training Clinic offers free psychological care to the community—benefiting children, adolescents, and adults—and promotes mental health and quality of life.
Modalities of care include individual psychotherapy, therapeutic groups, psychological assessment, neuropsychological assessment, career guidance, and psychological emergency care.
address: The Applied Psychology Training Clinic operates from Monday to Friday at the following addresses and hours:
Campus A: Av Desembargador Moreira, 2120 – Dionísio Torres (8:00 am to 12 pm and 2:00 pm to 6:00 pm) - SEPA
Campus B: Vicente Linhares Street, 308 – Aldeota (5:00 pm to 8:00 pm) - CESIU
services: Individual psychotherapy (children, adolescents, adults, older adults)

laboratory.title: University Clinical Analysis Laboratory (LEAC)
description: Since 2016, LEAC has supported the health services of the University Health Clinic and the School of Dentistry Teaching Clinic. With modern infrastructure and best practice quality systems, we provide laboratory services that support diagnosis and patient care while strengthening the training of highly skilled professionals.
address: Sample‑collection appointments are scheduled directly at the University Imaging and Diagnostic Center (CESIU) - Phones: 3306-8932 / 3306-8933 / Address: Rua Vicente Linhares, 308 - Aldeota.
services: Lipid profile (total cholesterol; HDL, LDL, VLDL)
